price: 3. »(Y dice que) nuestro Señor, en Su magnificencia y majestuosidad, no ha tomado ninguna compañera ni ha tenido ningún hijo;
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu taʿālā jaddu rabbinā mā ittakhadha ṣāḥibatan walā waladan
